title: New update. news panel
descriptionm: Version 2.0 is being gradually rolled out across the Jtool suite. This update will introduce a user interface that enhances interaction between you and your tools.While no new tools will be added in version 2.0 we are focusing on refining our existing library. Fun Fact: You can add your own custom scripts to Jtools alongside your regular tools. However we recommend doing this only if you are confident in your skills as incorrect scripts could cause significant issues.
